summary: Adds Nylea, an Elven Archer, as a loyal follower and burden carrier.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=4][u]Summary[/u][/size][/font]

Another of my characters converted to a follower, Nylea is an Elven Archer located in the Temple of Kynareth, Whiterun. She is essential and scales with player level. I gave her perks and stats similar to other followers in the vanilla game, in an attempt to keep her balanced.

[u][size=4]Follower Info[/size][/u]

Name: Nylea
Voice: EvenToned
Body: Sevenbase, UNP, UNPB, CBBE
Default Armor: Leather
Default Weapon: Hunting Bow
Location: Temple of Kynareth, Whiterun
Both marriable and essential.

[size=4][u]Required Mods[/u][/size]

You'll need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url] for any BBP versions, or you will CTD.

[size=4][u]Videos[/u][/size]
[youtube]ss35P3-VcNA[/youtube]

[size=4][u]Recommended Mods[/u][/size]

One of the follower overhaul mods([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO[/url])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]

[u][size=4]Mods used in screenshots[/size][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62667/?]Kinematic ENB Southern Light[/url]
Epic Natural ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60261/?]Facial Expressions Project (F.E.P)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26916/?]JinhuaCat Outfit - UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?]JinhuaCat Retextures UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?]Tembtra Thief Armor UNP - CBBE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60814/?]Katarina Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19319/?]Witch Elf Armor - UNP[/url]

[u][size=4]F.A.Q[/size][/u]

[b]Any other body support?[/b]
Nope, I just did the most popular ones, it's easy to change the body yourself.

[b]Her face is darker than her body, what do?[/b]
Lowering the mod in your load order should fix it.

[b]Can I have her preset?[/b]
I'm not sharing this one, sorry.

[b]Is she custom voiced?[/b]
Nope.

[b]Can you make X optional file?[/b]
I might move her location if there're requests for it, but I don't plan on doing any other optional files.

[u][size=4]Credits[/size][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by Expired[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - WIP by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE by drunkenmojo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62639/?]Empyrean Warpaints - Custom Series (female) by Empyrean42[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs by Natilde[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33106/?]Standalone Followers Tutorial by zzjay[/url]

A big thank you to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3970139/?]VRDaphni[/url] for all the fixes in the new version.

[u][size=4]Last Words[/size][/u]

[list][*][size=2]I I had to give her new brows due to lack of permissions, you can see her newer look in the screenshots.[/size]
[*][size=2]Thank you to all the mod authors and people that gave permissions, hopefully I didn't miss anyone in the credits.[/size]
[*][size=2]Don't upload this to other sites.[/size]
[/list]
[u][size=4]Previous Follower[/size][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62099/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/C3RdrFV.jpg[/img][/url]
